name: Avoid unreferenced Processes (TIBCO BW)
description: This metric retrieves all Tibco Processes that are not referenced i.e. not used by Tibco code.
output:
This report lists all Number of Tibco Processes that are not referenced.
It provides the following information:
Tibco Process full name
rationale: Unreferenced Processes like any other example of dead code make maintenance more difficult and more expensive.
remediation: Check if the members of class are going to be used. If not, then remove them from the class.
